pullRequest.body:
- Add `slope_neg_fun`
- Add `ConvexOn.slope_mono` and `ConcaveOn.slope_anti` in a new separate section called `slope`

---

```suggestion
/-- If `f : ùïú ‚Üí ùïú` is convex on `s`, then for any point `x ‚àà s` the slope of the secant line of `f`
through `x` is monotone on `s \ {x}`. -/
```
Just to match the variable names in the lemma statement.

```suggestion
/-- If `f : ùïú ‚Üí ùïú` is concave on `s`, then for any point `x ‚àà s` the slope of the secant line of `f`
through `x` is antitone on `s \ {x}`. -/
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: Monotonicity of the slope of a convex function
